name: stevche.radevski.eyenav
title: EyeNav: Eye-Tracking IDE Navigator
description: EyeNav is a Brackets.io plugin that allows you to do simple navigation in the IDE using an eye-tracking device. It allows you to scroll, click, select text, and more using your eyes and keyboard shortcuts.
author: Stevche Radevski (https://github.com/sradevski)
